name: 創意與美感設計研究
description: 使學生擁有對於設計美學的涵養以及認知並應用於各類設計領域
goals: 啟發學生的創意表達能力
改善自己原先具備的思考風格
解創意或創造的思考程序
syllabus:
課程簡紹

This class investigate the possibilities of creative and aesthetic design in four different disciplines which are city, building, product and graphic. In each discipline, there is a related lecture, guest speech or office visiting, and group research.  
 

課程目標

1.  Discuss the idea of creative and aesthetic design
2.  Develop research skill in design field
3.  Articulate the issues in creative and aesthetic design
4.  Widen the knowledge in other design fields  
     

教學進度與主題

The agenda of the class is to develop own design-related research topic and create a review system for each research focus of the creative and aesthetic design in various filed of design. The class conduct at least four visiting tours or guest lecture during the semester for students to find their interest in research. Class starts with an introduction, office visiting or guest lecture, case study report, and review for research agenda. Four sessions are focusing on a different topic, and students need to choose one of those to develop their research abstract and poster during the semester. The final requirement is to submit up to 1000 English word research paper.
